item.description: Julian, glad 2c a synopsis of what ye guys are up 2 over there. Congrats on your success and he "will" to change direction with Tablane etc.

Julian,
glad 2c a synopsis of what ye guys are up 2 over there.
Congrats on your success and he “will” to change direction with Tablane etc.
